mapper.sql: id, name, type, nature, province, city, county, address, contact_person, mobile, phone, email, remark, status, create_time, create_person_id, company_id,outlets_number

oi.id, oi.name, oi.type, oi.nature, oi.province, oi.city, oi.county, oi.address, oi.contact_person, oi.mobile, oi.phone, oi.email, oi.remark, oi.status, oi.create_time, oi.create_person_id, oi.company_id,outlets_number,puc.company_name
mapper.select: SELECT o.*,x1.name province_value,x2.name city_value,x3.name county_value FROM tms_outlets_info o JOIN lc_xzqh_info x1 ON o.province = x1.id JOIN lc_xzqh_info x2 ON o.city = x2.id JOIN lc_xzqh_info x3 ON o.county = x3.id where o.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into tms_outlets_info (id, name, type, nature, province, city, county, address, contact_person, mobile, phone, email, remark, status, create_time, create_person_id, company_id,outlets_number) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nature,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPersonId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outletsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tms_outlets_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{outletsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=BIGINT},
nature = #{nature,jdbcType=BIGINT},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_person = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_person_id = #{createPersonId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tms_outlets_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{outletsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=BIGINT}, nature = #{nature,jdbcType=BIGINT}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_person = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_person_id = #{createPersonId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete:
delete from tms_outlets_info where id in
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select outlets_number from tms_outlets_info where company_id = #{companyId} order by id desc limit 1
select id,name from tms_outlets_info where company_id = (select company_id from tms_outlets_info where create_person_id = #{userId} limit 1)

select oi.*,xi.name as province_value,xii.name as city_value,xiii.name as county_value from tms_outlets_info oi left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oi.province = xi.id left join lc_xzqh_info xii on oi.city = xii.id left join lc_xzqh_info xiii on oi.county = xiii.id where oi.id=#{outletsId} and oi.status != 0

select oi.id,oi.name, oi.type, oi.nature, oi.province, oi.city, oi.county, oi.address, oi.contact_person, oi.mobile, oi.phone, oi.email, oi.remark, oi.status, oi.create_time, oi.create_person_id, oi.company_id,oi.outlets_number, puc.company_name from tms_outlets_info oi left join lc_platform_user_company puc on oi.company_id = puc.id
where oi.id = #{outletsId}

select
from tms_outlets_info where company_id = #{companyId}
SELECT o.outlets_number, com.company_code FROM tms_outlets_info o JOIN lc_platform_user_company com ON o.company_id = com.id WHERE o.id = (SELECT outlets_id FROM tms_line_info WHERE id = #{lineId})
SELECT o.outlets_number, com.company_code FROM tms_outlets_info o JOIN lc_platform_user_company com ON o.company_id = com.id WHERE o.id = #{id}

select oi.*,pd.name as typeValue,pd1.name as natureValue, xi.name as provinceValue,xi1.name as cityValue,xi2.name as countyValue from tms_outlets_info oi left join lc_platform_dictionary pd on oi.type = pd.id left join lc_platform_dictionary pd1 on oi.nature = pd.id left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oi.province = xi.id left join lc_xzqh_info xi1 on oi.city = xi1.id left join lc_xzqh_info xi2 on oi.county = xi2.id where oi.id = #{id}
select from tms_outlets_info

select oi.*,puc.company_name,xi.name as province_value,xii.name as city_value, xiii.name as county_value,u.login_name,u.true_name,pd.name as type_value from tms_outlets_info oi left join lc_platform_user_company puc on oi.company_id = puc.id left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oi.province = xi.id left join lc_xzqh_info xii on oi.city = xii.id left join lc_xzqh_info xiii on oi.county = xiii.id left join tms_user u on oi.create_person_id = u.id left join lc_platform_dictionary pd on pd.id = oi.type WHERE oi.company_id = #{outletsInfo.companyId} or puc.company_name = #{outletsInfo.companyName} limit #{page.start},#{page.limit}

select COUNT(1) from tms_outlets_info oi left join lc_platform_user_company puc on oi.company_id = puc.id left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oi.province = xi.id left join lc_xzqh_info xii on oi.city = xii.id left join lc_xzqh_info xiii on oi.county = xiii.id left join tms_user u on oi.create_person_id = u.id left join lc_platform_dictionary pd on pd.id = oi.type WHERE oi.company_id = #{outletsInfo.companyId} or puc.company_name = #{outletsInfo.companyName}
select * from tms_outlets_info toi WHERE toi.company_id = #{companyId}
